name: Log Drive Runner
description: A both relaxing and super-hectic game, a new variant of the endless runner genre, based on the log flume in Notodden, Norway.Run as far as you can, get your score on the leaderboards, beat your friends!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium class computer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Standard graphics card. (note: for full screen good resolution one need a gamer graphics card) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 330 MB available space Sound Card: Standard soundcard Additional Notes: Note: there are options for running the game in lower resolutions and graphics. The minimum system requirements will not run in full quality in full resolution in full screen.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Gamer grapichs card for best quality, best resolution full screen, like a Nvidia 950 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 330 MB available space Sound Card: Standard soundcard
